parameter.value: Yeah, good bye and don't come again !
If another prince comes to kiss me, I'll kick his ass so bad that he'll need a sedan chair to get away.
Don't even try to kiss me or I'll rondhouse kick you !
Talking frogs don't exist, idiot. It's your fucking imagination tricking you. And now your imagination commands you to walk away.
Finally someone notices I'm a FROG. Congratulations, you're VERY observant... *sigh*
A quest ? Yeah I got a quest ! Go and tell King Tibianus his son tried to kiss me again !
Pyrale ? That idiot transformed me into an human once. But my wife came and kissed me, so I'm a frog again.
Pyrale ? That idiot transformed me into an human once. But my wife came and kissed me, so I'm a frog again.
